SELECT "composite_key" AS "cmpyKey"
, "news_date" AS "newsDate" , "company_name" AS "cmpyName"
, round(cast(ta_score as numeric),4) AS "taScre" , "news_title" AS "newsTtl" , "raw_data" AS "rawData" , "ext_morphs" AS "extMorp"
FROM NLP."nlp_news_test" where company_name_only like concat('%',#{cmpyNameOnly},'%') or raw_data like concat('%',#{cmpyNameOnly},'%') or news_title like concat('%',#{cmpyNameOnly},'%') limit 1000
